is this works in xp and if do where i can download daemon tools  is this needs daemon tools and how to use daemon tool and is this free full version or just for a hour 5 ratings to that who help me and 5 ratings to the uploader if this works!!!!

Playing ISO Files: 
Download: POWERISO (Also avalible on Piratebay)
Instal.... 
Run it. 
next to your clock you will see a icon of a cd-rom. 
Right click. 
Select 'Set Number of drives'. 
Select '1 Drivers'.
Right click the icon again.
Select 'Drive [:]'
Select 'Mount image...'
Go to the map you downloaded the programme in. 
Select the *.iso file. 
Go to 'My Computer'
Select Drive  

and the you go. 

Have fun
Thank you!

How to install:
-Download Daemon Tools PRO (haven't tested alcohol 120%, etc)
-Mount the fas-18wh.cue file
-run setup.exe on the virtual drive.
-install.
-Extract the patch_1_06.zip to installation folder
-run patch_1_06.exe & Patch

-Launce normally!
